Package com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.dao

Class UserWatchHistoryDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
com.jmill29.tvtrackerapi.dao.UserWatchHistoryDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserWatchHistoryDao
@Repository public class UserWatchHistoryDaoImpl extends Object implements UserWatchHistoryDao
JDBC-based implementation of the UserWatchHistoryDao interface for managing user watch history in the database.

Provides methods for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting watch history records for users using direct JDBC queries.

    • getWatchHistoryByUserId

      public List<UserWatchHistoryResponse> getWatchHistoryByUserId(int userId, boolean getAll) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the watch history for a specific user by user ID.
      Specified by:
      getWatchHistoryByUserId in interface UserWatchHistoryDao
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      getAll - if true, retrieves all shows; if false, only shows with a watch history entry
      Returns:
      a list of UserWatchHistoryResponse objects representing the user's watch history
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
